transcript.transcript: Hi there. My name is Ethan Klein and my favorite hobby is spending hundreds of thousands of dollars on lawyers. Today I invite you into my home to share my favorite pastime with you. Join me in creating generational wealth for my attorney. Let me tell you guys a story. About a year and a half ago, it was a big conversation called ReactGate. ReactGate was a debate going on in the streaming community about what constituted fair use.
